alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Macon, Pulaski, northwestern Wilcox, northeastern Dooly, southeastern Peach and Houston Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Henderson to near Unadilla to near Pope City, and moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hawkinsville, Unadilla, Pineview, Pinehurst, Hayneville, Browndale, Meadowdale, Houston Lake, Elko, Mock Springs, Grove Park, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Pleasant View, Powerville, Moss Oak, Tippettville, Pulaski State Prison, and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
